price: 39. "O two companions of the prison! Are many different lords (gods) better or Allâh, the One, the Irresistible?
arabic: يَٰصَٰحِبَيِ ٱلسِّجۡنِ ءَأَرۡبَابٞ مُّتَفَرِّقُونَ خَيۡرٌ أَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: yāṣāḥibayi al-sij'ni a-arbābun mutafarriqūna khayrun ami al-lahu al-wāḥidu al-qahāru
